# Sec Api

- [Authentication](https://docs.finfeedapi.com/authentication.md)
- [Index](https://docs.finfeedapi.com/index.md)
- [Jsonrpc Api](https://docs.finfeedapi.com/jsonrpc-api.md)
- [Mcp](https://docs.finfeedapi.com/mcp.md)
- [Websocket](https://docs.finfeedapi.com/websocket.md)

## Rest Api

- [Convert Xbrl Data To Json Format](https://docs.finfeedapi.com/rest-api/convert-xbrl-data-to-json-format.md)
- [Download File From Sec Edgar Archive](https://docs.finfeedapi.com/rest-api/download-file-from-sec-edgar-archive.md)
- [Extract And Classify Sec Filing Content](https://docs.finfeedapi.com/rest-api/extract-and-classify-sec-filing-content.md)
- [Extract Specific Item Content From Sec Filing](https://docs.finfeedapi.com/rest-api/extract-specific-item-content-from-sec-filing.md)
- [Finfeedapi Sec Rest Api](https://docs.finfeedapi.com/rest-api/finfeedapi-sec-rest-api.md)
- [Full Text Search Of Sec Filing Documents](https://docs.finfeedapi.com/rest-api/full-text-search-of-sec-filing-documents.md)
- [Query Sec Filing Metadata](https://docs.finfeedapi.com/rest-api/query-sec-filing-metadata.md)
